research.title: Brain-Computer Interface (BCI)
research.description: Developing innovative approaches to human-computer integration through brain-computer interfaces. This project explores the potential of direct neural communication with digital systems.

research.title: Quantum Computing Applications
research.description: Investigating practical applications of quantum computing in solving complex computational problems. This research focuses on quantum algorithms and their potential impact on various fields.

research.title: Advanced Robotics Systems
research.description: Exploring the integration of AI and robotics to create more adaptive and intelligent robotic systems. This project aims to advance human-robot interaction and autonomous capabilities.

interests.focus: Interdisciplinary research combining multiple fields to create innovative solutions
